types_of_rounds.HR_interview: Behavioral questions and cultural fit assessment

suggestions: Enhance statistical analysis skills and familiarity with data visualization tools.
online_test_question: Analyze a given dataset and derive actionable insights.

types_of_rounds.coding_challenge: Solve coding challenges related to machine learning
types_of_rounds.HR_interview: Evaluate problem-solving skills and cultural fit

suggestions: Brush up on machine learning concepts and algorithms.
online_test_question: Implement a linear regression model from scratch.

types_of_rounds.case_study_analysis: Analyze marketing case studies and propose solutions
types_of_rounds.group_discussion: Collaborate with peers on marketing challenges
types_of_rounds.HR_interview: Evaluate communication skills and cultural fit

suggestions: Stay updated with current marketing trends and practices.
online_test_question: Propose a marketing campaign for a new product.

types_of_rounds.portfolio_review: Evaluate design portfolio and previous projects
types_of_rounds.design_challenge: Complete a design task within a specified time
types_of_rounds.technical_interview: Discuss design principles and software proficiency
types_of_rounds.HR_interview: Evaluate personality traits and cultural fit

suggestions: Build a strong portfolio showcasing design skills and creativity.
online_test_question: Design a logo for a fictional company.

types_of_rounds.telephonic_interview: Discuss financial concepts and market trends
types_of_rounds.case_study_analysis: Analyze financial reports and propose solutions
types_of_rounds.HR_interview: Evaluate interpersonal skills and cultural fit

suggestions: Stay updated with financial news and practice quantitative analysis.
online_test_question: Analyze a financial statement and identify key metrics.
